messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

oracle requests for a past employee thursday november pm requests past hi forwarding received about he left requesting him period until please him thank best regards thursday november please action reports dear part established processes each required submit his weekly basis each friday past must submitted receiving because reports haven followed process please help cascade accordingly gets possible breakdown reports country date total days

It seems the key problem is around compliance or process adherence regarding data related to the past employee.
